<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// NEONThumb2DataIPostEncoder - Post-process encoded NEON data-processing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions, and rewrite them to their Thumb2 form if we are currently in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Thumb2 mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#ab049d5efc5e729c5f457c6430542cd5b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#ab049d5efc5e729c5f457c6430542cd5b">ARMMCCodeEmitter::NEONThumb2DataIPostEncoder</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EncodedValue,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#a2368235ddbd4b65c66fdca0a42b1ab64">isThumb2</a>(STI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NEON Thumb2 data-processsing encodings are very simple: bit 24 is moved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to bit 12 of the high half-word (i.e. bit 28), and bits 27-24 are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set to 1111</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bit24 = EncodedValue &amp; 0x01000000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bit28 = Bit24 &lt;&lt; 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EncodedValue &amp;= 0xEFFFFFFF;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EncodedValue |= Bit28;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EncodedValue |= 0x0F000000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EncodedValue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Thumb BL and BLX use a strange offset encoding where bits 22 and 21 are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determined by negating them and XOR&#39;ing them with bit 23</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627" lineLink="#ab947196869d4c2d094c9bb9e5ad71800"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int32&#95;t <a href="#ab947196869d4c2d094c9bb9e5ad71800">encodeThumbBLOffset</a>(int32&#95;t offset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  offset &gt;&gt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t S  = (offset &amp; 0x800000) &gt;&gt; 23;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t J1 = (offset &amp; 0x400000) &gt;&gt; 22;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t J2 = (offset &amp; 0x200000) &gt;&gt; 21;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  J1 = (~J1 &amp; 0x1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  J2 = (~J2 &amp; 0x1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  J1 ^= S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  J2 ^= S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  offset &amp;= ~0x600000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  offset |= J1 &lt;&lt; 22;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  offset |= J2 &lt;&lt; 21;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getThumbBLTargetOpValue - Return encoding info for immediate branch target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#a4ef1e8d05352203ec2fb71f51f563c42"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#a4ef1e8d05352203ec2fb71f51f563c42">ARMMCCodeEmitter::</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IT masks are encoded as a sequence of replacement low-order bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the condition code. So if the low bit of the starting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition code is 1, then we have to flip all the bits above the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowBit = Mask &amp; -Mask;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Immediate is always encoded as positive. The &#39;U&#39; bit controls add vs sub.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the expression doesn&#39;t have :upper16:, :lower16: on it, it&#39;s just a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// plain immediate expression, previously those evaluated to the lower 16 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the expression regardless of whether we have a movt or a movw, but that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// validateInstruction() so this should never happen.  The same holds for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thumb1 :upper8&#95;15:, :upper0&#95;7:, lower8&#95;15: or :lower0&#95;7: with movs or adds.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;:upper0&#95;7:, lower8&#95;15: or :lower0&#95;7:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the immediate is B bits long, we need B+1 bits in order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to represent the (inverse of the) sign bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt;&lt;= (Bits + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int32&#95;t tmp = (int32&#95;t)MO2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (tmp == INT32&#95;MIN) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represents subtracting zero rather than adding it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">    tmp = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (tmp &lt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    tmp = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2816e84a08c108d18bc4665bc1817e01">abs</a>(tmp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= (1U &lt;&lt; Bits); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the ADD bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= (tmp &gt;&gt; Shift) &amp; ((1U &lt;&lt; Bits) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#a480e4cd8c4f5f6ede9f93e1aa4508964"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#a480e4cd8c4f5f6ede9f93e1aa4508964">ARMMCCodeEmitter::</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MCFixup&gt;</a> &amp;Fixups,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;STI)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Needs fixup support.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tmp = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MO1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">int32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(tmp) &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    tmp = -tmp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= 256; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the ADD bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= tmp &amp; 255;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sub-operands are &#91;reg, imm&#93;. The first register is Rm, the reg to be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LSL - 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ASR - 100</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ROR - 110</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SOpc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown shift opc!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a76f5f9f36bbd9f03c844c5b565f239efaafeb1424944dafbde8a990bce1f5bd84">ARM&#95;AM::lsl</a>: SBits = 0x0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 10 bits. lower 5 bits are the lsb of the mask, high five bits are the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// msb of the mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand">MCOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t v = ~MO.getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t lsb = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(v);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t msb = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">llvm::Log2&#95;32</a>(v);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(v != 0 &amp;&amp; lsb &lt; 32 &amp;&amp; msb &lt; 32 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Illegal bitfield mask!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lsb | (msb &lt;&lt; 5);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#abf0dad97f8fcbf302ee8cf6d8647a647"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-armmccodeemitter-cpp-/armmccodeemitter/#abf0dad97f8fcbf302ee8cf6d8647a647">ARMMCCodeEmitter::</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VPT Masks are actually encoded as a series of invert/don&#39;t invert bits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rather than true/false bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevBit = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 3; i &gt;= 0; --i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bit = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt; i) &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we are at the end of the mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp; ~(~0U &lt;&lt; i)) == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Imm |= (1 &lt;&lt; i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert the bit in the mask based on the previous bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Bit != PrevBit)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Imm |= (1 &lt;&lt; i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrevBit = Bit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
